shortAboutme.title: About me
shortAboutme.text: I am a Full Stack developer with over 2 years of experience. I have worked both in businesses and as a freelancer. My specialization is in developing web applications using React.ts and writing RESTful APIs in Go. Additionally, I have experience in cybersecurity, being able to protect web applications from various threats and attacks. My English language skills are at a level where I can read documentation effectively.
